channel.title: Batch coding
channel.description: i couldent find any tuts on creating .bats etc in the tut forum. wheres a tut or website i can read adn learn on this?

item.title: Batch coding
item.dc:creator: @NojTB NojTB
item.description:
@NojTB wrote:

I already no html, JavaScript websites. Games (still learning). Batch stuff now. And a bit about scar scripting (never bothered learning much of it). and of course real languages English and some French.

item.title: Batch coding

item.description:
@RXVL wrote:

thanks but i didint like the site. loked bad so i didint read lmao. but i found another one with the google suggestion so kinda help
and i just created my first batch of course il never ever run it or il fuck up my entire computer lmao.
[/quote]

I suggest you quit while your ahead, go out and get some friends.[/quote]

I’ll second that. Learn a better language.
